Class OrderSystem

java.lang.Object
cz2002.system.OrderSystem
public class OrderSystem extends Object
Manages all the data and inputs from OrderUI and Order ArrayList

      discountamt - Discount Amount offered to Customer
      Restaurant - Restaurant Object used print restaurant details in receipt
